events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle on the highway, requesting to file a new insurance claim immediately.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the keywords related to vehicle collision and damages reported.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle the case and contact the customer for further details.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and will now proceed with further processing.
The claims agent requested copies of the police report, accident photos, and the customerâ€™s vehicle registration documents to continue the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police reports and vehicle photos, enabling the investigation process to begin promptly.
The investigation into the auto accident damages and liability began following receipt of all necessary documentation.
Investigation concluded confirming the extent of damage and validated that the customer is eligible for claim settlement.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and a rental car allowance was proposed to the customer for their damaged vehicle.
Customer responded positively accepting the proposed settlement and thanked the agent for quick and thorough support.
The insurance claim was officially approved and authorized for payment disbursement as per the settlement terms.
Insurance payment was successfully issued to the customer to cover the repair costs as approved in the settlement.
The auto accident insurance claim was closed following the full settlement payment and confirmation from the customer.
The claim documents and correspondence were archived as the claim was successfully completed and closed without further issues.
